privacy.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This app needs access to your Apple Music library.
privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires Bluetooth to connect to accessories.
privacy.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app uses Bluetooth to communicate with peripherals.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to your camera for video and photo capture.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID for secure authentication.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to display your health stats.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app integrates with the Health app to track your health data.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app scans the local network for nearby devices.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for audio recording.
privacy.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app uses motion data to enhance the user experience.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app saves photos to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to your Photo Library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app tracks your usage to provide better service.

apps.localizedDescription:
0.8.12 Beta 
 
 Added helpful tips.
Added clickable author.
Added touch abnormality detection.
Added opening server item links directly.
Changed default render mode to lightweight.
Improved UI/UX.
Improved performance.
Fixed default servers not working for new players.
Fixed race condition in multiplayer.
Fixed preview BGM not stopping in SFX preview. 
 
 Credit: 
 Jordyr1 (Modified repository)
apps.name: Sonolus

versions.localizedDescription: Sonolus is a next generation Mobile Rhythm Game that aims to provide maximum freedom to players and level makers.
